pages.text: By using a $(l:besmirchment:brewing/love)Love Potion$() and casting a Ritual of $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Binding$(), one can force rather unconventional familiars.$(br)These familiars generally do not grant extraordinary powers that help with witchcraft, though they do offer some benefits.

Such forced familiars will usually not bow themselves to the will of their owner. Generally speaking, forcing anything to become a familiar is a horrible idea, and you really should $(o)not$() do that.$(br)Nevertheless, some unconventional familiars will be listed here.
Binding with a $(marked)Villager will arrange a pagan marriage.

This is a very ceremonial act, so make sure you dress properly!$(br)When married to a Villager, other Villagers will hardly ever think bad of you. Most damages to reputation are drastically reduced, so you may have an easier time becoming popular.
